author: neilg
msg: modify grammar pool implementation to that, once locked, a thread-safe StringPool is used

author: neilg
msg: implementation of a StringPool implementation that permits thread-safe updates.  This can now be used by a grammar pool that is locked so that scanners have somehwere to store information about newly-encountered URIs

author: neilg
msg: make StringPool functions virtual so that we can implement a synchronized version of StringPool for thread-safe updates.
